    *After any promotional period, subscription continues to be charged at the regular price and specified term, unless cancelled in Microsoft account. You’ll be notified before any price changes. See terms <link to: xbox.com/subscriptionterms>. Play over 100 high-quality games on Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S for one low monthly price. Download and play the latest Xbox Game Studios games the same day they release, plus recent hits. Enjoy member discounts, like up to 20% off select games in the Xbox Game Pass for Console library, plus up to 10% off related game add-ons. With a huge variety of games from every genre, and new titles added all the time, there’s something for everyone. Sign in for your available offers. Promotional offers may not be valid for all members and are only available for a limited time. In Japan, Xbox Game Pass is only available for purchase to users 18 years and older. Offers not valid in Russia; other geographic restrictions may apply.
